text:
Free Yourself

Dimly lit room, tense atmosphere  
Raskolnikov: “Why should I thank God?”  

Stranger: “You killed only the old woman.”  

Stranger: “Harden your heart. Embrace justice.”  


---
Bright outdoors, hopeful vibe  
Stranger: “Life will bring you through.”  

Raskolnikov: “Who are you?”  

Stranger: “A man with nothing to hope for.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov is urged to confront his actions and embrace the possibility of redemption despite his fears and despair.
